titleStmt.title: Strage and wonderful prophesies foretelling the alterations of the time and also the change that will happen in the world, at first what wonderful things will come to pass concerning this kingdom to the great amazement of all mankind, secondly one strange and wonderful prophesie which particularly does mention what shall happen yearly to several kingdoms in the world both by sea and land / by Dr. Bouram
titleStmt.author: Bouram, Strage, Dr.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Dr. Strage [sic] Bouram. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
"Sent in a letter to a merchant in London with allowance according to order."
Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: pages creased with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
